src:
川金4會有譜 南韓情報機構：金正恩12月將晤川普
04 Nov 2019, 19:23 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社記者姜遠珍首爾4日專電）南韓國家情報院今天在國會進行的非公開國政質詢中，向國會情報委員會朝野議員透露，目前掌握到北韓國務委員會委員長金正恩已決定在12月與美國總統川普第4次會晤的情資。
南韓聯合新聞通訊社指出，國會情報委員會的朝野政黨幹事－執政黨共同民主黨國會議員金民基（音）、在野黨自由韓國黨國會議員李恩載（音）在國家情報院的閉門報告過程中，走出會場向國會記者們公布這項訊息。
報導稱，南韓國家情報院認為，實務協商會在11月中或最晚12月初展開，以協調舉行第4次川金會。
川金首會是在2018年6月12日，川普和金正恩於新加坡舉行首次歷史性高峰會；今年2月27日、28日川金二人在越南河內再度舉行高峰會；今年6月30日川金二人在分隔南北韓的非軍事區（DMZ）第3度會談。（編輯：韋樞）1081104

text:
Chuanjin 4 will have a spectrum South Korean intelligence agency: Kim Jong-un will meet with Trump in December
04 Nov 2019, 19:23 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency reporter Jiang Yuanzhen, Seoul, 4th) The South Korean National Intelligence Agency revealed to the Congressional Intelligence Committee, Mr. Kono, in a non-public state question in Congress today that Kim Jong-un, the chairman of the North Korean Affairs Committee, has decided to go to the US President in December. The fourth meeting of the Prime Minister.
South Korea’s joint news agency pointed out that the ruling party’s opposition party party, the ruling party’s Democratic Party MP Kim Min Ki, and the opposition party’s Liberal Party member Li Enzai’s report in the National Intelligence Agency’s closed-door report, walked out of the venue. Congressional reporters announced the message.
According to the report, the South Korean National Intelligence Agency believes that the substantive consultation will be held in mid-November or at the beginning of December to coordinate the fourth Sichuan Gold Council.
Chuanjin’s first meeting was held on June 12, 2018. Trump and Kim Jong-un held their first historic summit in Singapore. On February 27 and 28 this year, Sichuan and Chongqing held another summit in Hanoi, Vietnam; this year, June 30 Nichikawa Kim was in the third meeting of the demilitarized zone (DMZ) separating North and South Korea. (Editor: Wei Shu) 1081104
